availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles Henry Ingram (Caldwell County, Kentucky, publisher)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, publisher. Kentucky native. Son of George J. Ingram and Mary M. Ingram. Student in Caldwell County in 1850. Publisher and proprietor of The Princeton Bulletin in Caldwell County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 344A.
Find A Grave, "Charles Henry Ingram (1837-1910)," Memorial #141660354, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/141660354 (accessed May 13, 2021).
KYR-0001-020-0006.
